title.narrative: Joint UN Maternal Newborn &#38;#38; Child Health Program

description.narrative: The Joint United Nations (UN) Maternal Newborn and Child Health Program (MNCH) aims to contribute to the targets of the National Strategic Plans for Reproductive Health and Child Health Development by reducing maternal, newborn and child deaths. It will do this by improving capacity and increasing health services coverage. The program will cover a projected population of 21.3 million around 8 million of whom live in hard to reach townships. The total value of this initiative is $5.0 million over 5 years, starting 2011-12.
